name: Arabica Adventures
description:
The creative brewery has an infestation! Help Arabica clear the dungeons by forming a team of creatives and making it as far as you can through the nest.

Click on Arabica for tutorial.

Collab with Carpengizmat

Made for Creative Brew event "Arabica Adventures"

PS: The game turned out to be pretty tough and bugged, numerous replays are recommended to achieve progress ;)
